notes.text: We now provide an option for application developers to freeze the first n columns in a grid and analytical table. You can now freeze the first columns in a table so that they don't move when scrolling the table horizontally
You can now create Integration cards from the analytical list page and add them to the Insights section
A data field within an empty row of a table is now kept in display mode when the underlying property is listed under the NonInsertableProperties annotation
We have resolved an issue with enabling the Delete button on an object page table
We now offer a 'Share as card' option in Microsoft Teams
We now support the creation of insights cards from list report tables.
We now evaluate UI.FilterFacets when determining the adaptability of filters
We now show the share button with the correct spacing
We've resolved the issue of the Unsaved Changes icon appearing in Create mode
We now ensure the DraftIndicator is shown only for a draft root entity
We now provide backward compatibility for Aggregation.Aggregatable annotation
: We've resolved the issue related to the filtering of the table based on the selected chart values
Empty rows are now displayed in the creation mode until the editMode is fully computed
We now ensure icons are displayed correctly in a data point based scenario
The computed fields label within an empty table row is now empty
Connected fields are now displayed correctly when resizing the browser window
You can now delete draft-enabled entities with no delete restrictions
We've now enabled the filtering on draft-related properties by default
We now correctly display the DataFieldWithUrl annotation on a table
We now support SideEffects with multiple SourceProperties for the MultiValueField in a virtual field group
We now provide triggerSearch as a public API for the FilterBar building block
We've improved the type-ahead behavior in case text annotations are missing or constraints for existing text annotations are violated
We've resolved an issue related to the enablement of the Delete button in a table after a SideEffect request
We improved the evaluation wether a table property is filterable
Empty rows are now displayed correctly when modifying dynamic InsertRestrictions
We now manage the runtime building block with an event associated to a CommandExecution to ensure tooltips are correctly displayed for all buttons
